ED_Title: Strengthening the role of mediation in the peaceful settlement of disputes, conflict prevention and resolution
ED_DecisionText: At its 108th plenary meeting, on 6 September 2024, the General Assembly decided to include the sub-item entitled “Strengthening the role of mediation in the peaceful settlement of disputes, conflict prevention and resolution” of the item entitled “Prevention of armed conflict” in the draft agenda of its seventy-ninth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in document A/78/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
